cubicle.description:
You're now in the cubicle. You begin to take stock of what's here.

 Oh, great. Here's a stand. [if there is something on the s_0]On the stand you make out [a list of things on the s_0].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_0]But there isn't a thing on it. Oh! Why couldn't there just be stuff on it?[end if] You can make out a shelf. The shelf is typical.[if there is something on the s_1] On the shelf you can make out [a list of things on the s_1], so there's that.[end if][if there is nothing on the s_1] Unfortunately, there isn't a thing on it. Silly shelf, silly, empty, good for nothing shelf.[end if]

 There is [if d_3 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] gate leading east. You need an unguarded exit? You should try going south. There is an unblocked exit to the west.

washroom.description:
Fancy seeing you here. Here, by the way, being the washroom. You can barely contain your excitement.

 Oh, great. Here's a board. The board is standard.[if there is something on the s_2] On the board you can make out [a list of things on the s_2].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_2] But oh no! there's nothing on this piece of trash.[end if] You see a rack. The rack is standard.[if there is something on the s_3] On the rack you can see [a list of things on the s_3].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_3] But oh no! there's nothing on this piece of garbage. Oh! Why couldn't there just be stuff on it?[end if]

You don't like doors? Why not try going east, that entranceway is unblocked.

cookhouse.description:
You're now in the cookhouse. Okay, just remember what you're here to do, and everything will go great.



 There is [if d_3 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] gate leading west. There is [if d_2 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] passageway leading north. There is [if d_0 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] door leading south.

canteen.description:
You arrive in a canteen. A standard one.

 You scan the room for a chair, and you find a chair. [if there is something on the s_4]You see [a list of things on the s_4] on the chair.[end if][if there is nothing on the s_4]However, the chair, like an empty chair, has nothing on it. What, you think everything in TextWorld should have stuff on it?[end if]

 There is [if d_0 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] door leading north. There is an unguarded exit to the south. You don't like doors? Why not try going west, that entranceway is unguarded.

bedroom.description:
I am sorry to announce that you are now in the bedroom. You decide to just list off a complete list of everything you see in the room, because hey, why not?



There is an unblocked exit to the east. There is an exit to the north. Don't worry, it is unguarded.

steam room.description:
Well, here we are in the steam room.

 You can make out a counter. Make a note of this, you might have to put stuff on or in it later on. The counter is typical.[if there is something on the s_5] On the counter you can make out [a list of things on the s_5].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_5] The counter appears to be empty.[end if]

 There is [if d_2 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] passageway leading south. There is [if d_1 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] portal leading west. There is an exit to the east. Don't worry, it is unguarded.

studio.description:
Of every studio you could have walked into, you had to show up in an ordinary one.

 You can see a locker. Classic TextWorld.[if c_0 is open and there is something in the c_0] The locker contains [a list of things in the c_0].[end if][if c_0 is open and the c_0 contains nothing] The locker is empty! What a waste of a day![end if]

 There is [if d_1 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] portal leading east. You need an unblocked exit? You should try going west.

pantry.description:
You are in a pantry. A typical one.

 You make out [if c_1 is locked]a locked[else if c_1 is open]an opened[otherwise]a closed[end if] case.[if c_1 is open and there is something in the c_1] The case contains [a list of things in the c_1].[end if][if c_1 is open and the c_1 contains nothing] The case is empty! This is the worst thing that could possibly happen, ever![end if]

You need an unblocked exit? You should try going west.

attic.description:
You've just sauntered into an attic.

 You can see [if c_2 is locked]a locked[else if c_2 is open]an opened[otherwise]a closed[end if] coffer.[if c_2 is open and there is something in the c_2] The coffer contains [a list of things in the c_2]. I mean, just wow! Isn't TextWorld just the best?[end if][if c_2 is open and the c_2 contains nothing] The coffer is empty, what a horrible day![end if]

There is an unblocked exit to the east.

chamber.description:
You find yourself in a chamber. A standard one.

 You can see a box. Is this it? Is this what you came to TextWorld to see? a box?[if c_3 is open and there is something in the c_3] The box contains [a list of things in the c_3].[end if][if c_3 is open and the c_3 contains nothing] The box is empty! This is the worst thing that could possibly happen, ever![end if]

There is an unblocked exit to the north.
